QuestData.Title: Written in Stone
QuestData.Description:
<You bundle the notes and store them away in your pack.
According to his final journal entry, Kel'danath used something called a "spellstone" in his experiments.
The spellstone, if not the arcanist himself, must be nearby.>
QuestData.CompletionText: <This withered seems entranced by the spellstone. He is completely pacified.>
QuestData.RewardText: <A small tag hanging from his sleeve reads "16 - Theryn.">
